Title: Requires municipalities to include a housing needs assessment using the HUD median income calculations in their comprehensive plans
Summary: Requires municipalities to include an Affordable Housing Needs Assessment to establish a data-based foundation for the creation and preservation of affordable housing in the municipality, utilizing the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development median income calculations, in their comprehensive plans.
